moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. h3 Nf6 4. Nc3 a6 5: This move changes it all.  White Queen is protecting pawn in f4 and impeding 31 ... Qf2 ##, not an easy question.
moves.31. bxc3 Nxc3: White Queen still cannot leave its position. The postion is lost.
moves.32. Nxd8 Rxd8 33. Qxd8+ Qxd8 34. Rgd1: Otherwise 34. ... Qh4 wins the bishop beacuse of 35. ...Qf2
moves.34... Nxd1 35. Rxd1 Qh4:
The same as before. 
Just a tactical question.
